ygData.subject: killing Griffs
ygData.msgSnippet: No kidding?  you can take on Griffons at 21?  What level are they...only low 20s?  That would be great news as dear ol Limdul made a vow back at 8th level to
ygData.messageBody:
No kidding? you can take on Griffons at 21? What level are they...only low
20s? That would be great news as dear ol' Limdul made a vow back at 8th
level to kill every Griffon on sight one day. :) Payback! heh

I've already wrecked revenge on Corflunk, Dvinn and Dorn. LimDul holds
grudges. :)

-- Lim'Dul
18th Wiz Veeshan

>Well after playing some other chars for awhile I decided to give my >wizard
>another shot. I went to the karanas. Instead of enstill I had root
> >memed. I
>didn't have Force Shock memed either. To my suprise the root rooted
> >griffawns
>and griffines great. Venlaan
>21st DE Wizard
